blockRepresentation
Class IBlock

java.lang.Object
  blockRepresentation.IBlock
Direct Known Subclasses:
AssignmentBlock, BooleanExpressionSubBlock, DeclarationBlock, ExpressionSubBlock, IfBlock, SkipBlock, WhileBlock
public abstract class IBlock
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
Francesco The memory representation of a program block

isControlBlock

public boolean isControlBlock()
Checks whether the block implements IControlBlock , here the default answer "no", is defined. The sub classes answering "yes" will just override the method

Returns:
true if it is, false otherwise

isDeclarationBlock

public boolean isDeclarationBlock()
Checks whether the block is of class DeclarationBlock , here the default answer "no", is defined. The sub classes answering "yes" will just override the method

Returns:
true if it is, false otherwise
